full_description:
Intern / Trainee Software Engineer
Full Time
Folsom, CA
Job Description
The person who has good academic background, having exposure to software skills and ability to work on software cloud applications.
Responsibilities:
Documenting and presenting processes and procedures
Work with individuals or in group setting to provide “how to” knowledge/demo sessions.
Troubleshoot/problem solve effectively and execute timely decisions in resolving issues.
Learn, and stay up to date with, the latest capabilities that ServiceNow has to offer.
Configure platform which includes activating of plug-ins.
Work with team to support in creating support tickets including collaborative troubleshooting with ServiceNow Support.
Monitor, optimize health, usage, and overall compliance of the ServiceNow platform.
Configuration, maintaining, monitoring and enhancing discovery for ServiceNow,
Analyzes business processes and documents functional requirements to increase operational maturity.
Develops use cases, process diagrams, and requirements documentation using stories and scrum tasks in ServiceNow.
Collaborates with clients and project team to design appropriate process solutions.
Evaluates requirement changes and provides feedback to ensure alignment to original design objectives.
Advises on options, risk and impacts on business processes and cultural adoption.
Follows up on outstanding needs and provides timely status reports to team lead / project manager.
Communicates technical problems and solutions to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Builds positive relationships with team and clients by providing excellent service / support and consistent communication as appropriate.
Performs accurate internal operational tasks such as time tracking, expense reporting and knowledge sharing.

Required Skills:
Bachelors / Masters Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology (OR) Equivalent.
Strong analytical, problem solving, interpersonal and communication skills required with exemplary communication ability, both written and verbal.
Excellent presentation skills.
Thorough attention to details, ability to multitask, and effective time management skills.
Knowledge of ServiceNow is highly desirable.
